resources.string:
Your goal is to reach 4000 points first. In your turn, you throw six dice, and then select these one, that gives points. Each 1 and 5 gives 100 and 50 points respectively. When you select three dice of the same value, you get 100 points times dice value. Each next dice of type gives twice as three of kind.
 
⚀ - 100 points
⚄ - 50 points
⚃ ⚃ ⚃ - 400 points
⚅ ⚅ ⚅ ⚅ - 1200 points
⚀ ⚀ ⚀ - 1000 points
⚅ ⚅ ⚅ ⚅ ⚅ - 1800 points
 Also, there are sequences.
⚀ ⚁ ⚂ ⚃ ⚄ - 500 points
⚁ ⚂ ⚃ ⚄ ⚅ - 750 points
⚀ ⚁ ⚂ ⚃ ⚄ ⚅ - 1500 points
 
When you don't have any dice that can give you points, skucha appears, you lose your turn and all the points earned in it, so be careful!
You can\'t take more than you have!
Text field must contain only numbers 0–9
Do you really want to leave a match? Your coins won\'t be returned!
Your inventory is empty, buy some special dice in shop and select them here
Select dice you want to use in the game
Here you can read the rules.
In shop you buy special dice, that gives you advantage.
In inventory you select dice you want to use in game.
You can wait or create one.
Tap a die to add or remove from your set
Currently there are no ads to display. Please try again later.
If you don\'t want to risk more, click Pass to finish your round. Then your opponent takes their turn.
As you see, three of a kind (or more) scores the die value × 100 points.
Three or more of kind also gives you points. Select first one.
Tap here to score your points and play further.
Click dice with value 1 or 5 to get points.
Welcome to Tavern Farkle!\n Roll the dice, score as many points as you can, and stay ahead of your opponent.
But be careful! If you roll and score nothing, you get skucha and lose your points for the round.
Play solo against the computer. Tap here to start a game and place your bet.
Multiplayer lets you play with real players, such as your friends. Join a lobby or create your own.
Not sure how to play Farkle? Click here to learn the rules. You can also check them anytime while playing.
A good strategy starts with choosing the right dice. Tap here to open the shop and buy special dice.
After buying special dice, don’t forget to select them in your Inventory. You can choose up to 6 special dice.
